articles.description: There's been plenty going on ahead of raceday but the major headline is three time Group I winning mare Sunlight becoming the latest of star sprinters to be retired.
articles.content:
There's been plenty going on ahead of raceday but the major headline is three-time Group I winning mare Sunlight becoming the latest of star sprinters to be retired.SUNLIGHT RETIRED
The time is now … [+1849 chars]
